snippet: Research that aims to unlock the mysteries of the brain seems likely to have a great impact on the courtrooms of the future.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column observes federal Brain Initiative, research that aims to unlock the mysteries of the brain, seems likely to have a great impact on the courtrooms of the future; it is now believed that diseased circuits cause diseased brains, which are experienced as psychiatric disorders; doctors question what such broken structures will mean if they cause someone to commit a crime.
lead_paragraph: Research that aims to unlock the mysteries of the brain seems likely to have a great impact on the courtrooms of the future.

headline.main: The Day When Neurons Go on Trial
